item.description:
Join us for the Fifth Annual
FIRST NIGHT AGAINST THE WARS!

Join us on December 31st in Copley Square from 1pm until 7pm to greet the New Year with a resounding call to end the wars and militarism.
Over a quarter of a million people pass through Copley Square for the First Night celebration. The Greater Boston Stop the Wars Coalition always receive a warm reception from New Year's Day revelers, while we pass out anti-war stickers and free food at this popular event.
No More Wars! US out of Afghanistan and Iraq! Bring the Troops Home Now!
End All U.S. Support for the Occupation of Palestine!

Even if you can't volunteer, we hope you'll stop by and say hello. Forward this to your friends. Everyone is welcome!

Download and help us pass out this invitational flyer
http://files.meetup.c...
item.name: First Night Against the Wars!
